files.title: Overview
files.summary: Im2col mode supports the following tensor dimensions : 3D, 4D and 5D. In this mode, the tensor data is treated as a batch of images with the following properties:

files.title: 5.5.4.1. Bounding Box
files.summary: In im2col mode, the Bounding Box is defined in DHW space. Boundaries along other dimensions are specified by Pixels-per-Column and Channels-per-Pixel parameters as described below.

files.title: 5.5.4.2. Traversal Stride
files.summary: The traversal stride, in im2col mode, does not impact the total number of elements (or pixels) being accessed unlike the tiled mode. Pixels-per-Column determines the total number of elements being accessed, in im2col mode.

files.title: 5.5.4.3. Out of Boundary Access
files.summary: In im2col mode, when the number of requested pixels in NDHW space specified by *Pixels-per-Column* exceeds the number of available pixels in the image batch then out-of-bounds access is performed.
